quizDescription: Think you're a movie buff? Test your knowledge of famous movie quotes from a variety of films.

questions.question: In which movie does the character say, 'Here's looking at you, kid'?
questions.explanation: The famous line 'Here's looking at you, kid' is from the movie Casablanca.

questions.question: Which film features the quote, 'You can't handle the truth!'?
questions.explanation: The quote 'You can't handle the truth!' is from the film A Few Good Men.

questions.question: What movie includes the line, 'May the Force be with you'?
options: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
questions.explanation: The iconic line 'May the Force be with you' is from the movie Star Wars.

questions.question: Which film features the quote, 'Life is like a box of chocolates; you never know what you're gonna get'?
questions.explanation: The famous line 'Life is like a box of chocolates; you never know what you're gonna get' is from the movie Forrest Gump.

questions.question: In which movie does the character say, 'Keep your friends close, but your enemies closer'?
questions.explanation: The line 'Keep your friends close, but your enemies closer' is from The Godfather: Part II.

questions.question: What film includes the quote, 'There's no place like home'?
questions.explanation: The iconic line 'There's no place like home' is from The Wizard of Oz.

questions.question: Which movie features the line, 'Here's Johnny!'?
questions.explanation: The famous line 'Here's Johnny!' is from the movie The Shining.

questions.question: What film includes the quote, 'To infinity and beyond!'?
questions.explanation: The memorable line 'To infinity and beyond!' is from the movie Toy Story.

questions.question: In which movie does the character say, 'You can't sit with us'?
questions.explanation: The line 'You can't sit with us' is from the movie Mean Girls.

questions.question: What film features the quote, 'Here's Johnny!'?
questions.explanation: The famous line 'Here's Johnny!' is from the movie The Shining.
